title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales volume in billion dollars, with a total of 13 data points.
Overall Sales volume in billion dollars has increased over the Year.
Sales volume in billion dollars is roughly increasing from 2006 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2009, and lastly gradually increasing from 2009 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
Max Sales volume in billion dollars about 13.85 was recorded at Year 2018
Min Sales volume in billion dollars about 8.25 was recorded at Year 2006
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales volume in billion dollars, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2009 to 2018.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2006 to 2009.
